title: woman surfing: medium-dark skin tone

verbs: To ride a wave, usually on a surfboard.
To use a surfboard; to surf.
Ride the waves of the sea with a surfboard
nouns: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)
Surfing is a surface water sport in which the wave rider, referred to as a surfer, rides on the forward or deep face of a moving wave, which is usually carrying the surfer towards the shore.
Surfing is a surface water sport in which the participant is carried along the face of a breaking wave, most commonly using a surfboard.
The sport of riding a surfboard toward the shore on the crest of a wave
Sport that consists of riding a wave
The sport of riding a surfboard using the power of the waves
The pastime or sport of riding surf on a surfboard.
Maneuver where the surfer turns and surfs back towards where the wave is breaking.

description: The Woman Surfing, Type-5 emoji is a sequence of the  Surfer,  Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-5, ? Female Sign and ? Variation Selector
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the woman surfing emoji showcases a dynamic figure with a medium-dark skin tone, poised confidently on a surfboard cresting a wave. The water's surface is rendered with Apple's signature smooth gradients and realistic lighting, creating a sense of motion and exhilaration. This emoji captures the spirit of adventure, freedom, and embracing challenges with the vibrant, glossy 3D aesthetic unique to Apple's design language.
